info.title: Aiminis POS API (Full Version)
info.description:
Full OpenAPI specification for Aiminis POS system, converted from Postman Collection.
Includes Auth, Users, Products, Flash Sales, Loyalty, Promotions, Booking, Affiliate, Games, Insurance, and more.

parameters.name: id
